metadata.title: CAT Men's 1310082 Crowbar Jacket - Quilt Lined
features: 6-ounce, 100% polyester twill with water resistant finish
6.9-ounce, 100% polyester oxford with PU coating lower pockets and back yoke
Durable oxford overlays at upper body and back yoke, collar and lower pockets
description: 6-ounce, 100% polyester twill with water resistant finish - 6.9-ounce, 100% polyester oxford with PU coating lower pockets and back yoke - 100% polyester taffeta lining - Durable oxford overlays at upper body and back yoke, collar and lower pockets - Action swing back for mobility - Inside left chest pocket with hook and loop flap closure and wire management - Adjustable cuffs with snap closure -
